reviewText: WOW!  This is an awesome FUN DVD!  Anyone can follow along!  It's especially perfect for a Youth Dance Ministry since it was produced for a church type setting.  So get off the couch and "Bust A Glorious Move!"  You'll be glad you did!
An excellent ressource especially for those who have youth who don't like slow move dances. Also, you can use it as a workout. It's great
This video is full of energy and fun and a perfect piece for a youth or young adult group dance ministry.

This is a fun and upbeat jazz style dance DVD that I highly recommend getting..  I love how Pastor Lynn breaks down the dance to show us step by step how to do it and also teaches flag movements for use with this dance too.  So many new moves to get you, your team and anyone to get motivated to step out of their comfort zone and try a little hip hop jazz routine.

So, you want to Hip Hop dance in church? Pazaz Praise with Hip/Hop Jazz Video is the perfect video for those who want to incorporate hip-hop and jazz movements into their praise dance choreography. This video provides examples of appropriate hip hop and jazz movements for church.

I love this DVD, and the name Pazaz.
Praise God! Pastor Lynn has shown us a way to `redeem` the worldly hip-hop type movements that are so popular today with young people and use them in Dancing for Him.  You`ll learn a whole dance, so whether you are young in years or young at heart, enjoy!!

This DVD shows a fun, varied and energetic dance that can be done to a fast, upbeat song. There are jazz and hip-hop moves throughout, but without the seductive body gyrations that would grieve the Holy Spirit. The dance is more of an intermediate level, but includes flaggers to heighten the atmosphere of praise and include beginners.
This DVD will get you up and dancing in no time to the upbeat music. The moves are clean and so fun to do you will want to keep going once the DVD is done. I really liked the DVD and you will too!
Great DVD pastor Lynn teaches a hip hop dance with great movements that can be use for praise dance.
